# Education

```{r}
# education dataframe
education <-
  as_tibble(
    rbind(
      cbind(
        logo = c("23andMe-omni.png"),
        inst = c("23andMe"),
        focus = c("Genetics & Parkinson's Disease"),
        degree = c("Postdoctoral Fellowship"),
        date = c("2022-present")
        ),
      # northshore
      cbind(
        c("ns-omni.png"),
        c("NorthShore University HealthSystem"),
        c("Pain Research"),
        c("Postdoctoral Research Fellowship"),
        c("2020-2022")
        ),
      # UTD
      cbind(
        c("utd-omni.png"),
        c("The Univeristy of Texas at Dallas"),
        c("Human Reasoning, Traumatic Brain Injury"),
        c("PhD Cognition and Neuroscience"),
        c("2014-2019")
        ),
      # LUC
      cbind(
        c("luc-omni.png"),
        c("Loyola University Chicago"),
        c("Analogical Reasoning, EEG"),
        position = c("BS Psychology: Natural Sciences"),
        date = c("2009-2013")
        )
      )
    )

# education table
reactable(
  education,
  columns = 
    list(
      # LOGO
      logo = colDef(
        name = "",
        cell = function(value){
          image <- img(src = paste0("images/", value), style = "height: 75px;") # orign 75px
          tagList(div(style = "display: inline-block; width: 75px;", image)) # orig 45px
          },
        width = 150, 
        align = "left"
      ),
      # DEGREE
      degree = colDef(
        name = "Degree/Focus/Institution",
        cell = function(value, index) {
          focus <- education$focus[index]
          inst <- education$inst[index]
          div(
            div(style = list(fontWeight = 600), value),
            div(style = list(fontSize = "0.75rem"), focus),
            div(style = list(fontSize = "0.75rem"), inst)
            )
          }
        ),
      # DATE
      date = colDef(name = "Dates", width = 150),
      # FOCUS
      focus = colDef(show = FALSE),
      # INSTITUTION
      inst = colDef(show = FALSE)
    ),
  defaultColDef = colDef(vAlign = "center", headerVAlign = "bottom"),
  fullWidth = TRUE,
  theme = reactableTheme(backgroundColor = "transparent") # for dark mode
  )
```

# Professional Positions

```{r}
# prof positions dataframe
prof_pos <-
  as_tibble(
    rbind(
      # 23andMe
      cbind(
        logo = c("23andMe-omni.png"), 
        pos = c("Postdoctoral Fellow"),
        dep = c("Research"),
        inst = c("23andMe"),
        date = c("2022-present")
        ),
      # shirley ryan
      cbind(
        c("sra-omni.png"),
        c("Visiting Scholar"),
        c("Center for Bionic Medicine"),
        c("Shirley Ryan AbilityLab"),
        c("2021-2022")
      ),
      # u of c
      cbind(
        c("uchicago-omni.png"),
        c("Clincian Researcher"),
        c("Department of Ob/Gyn"),
        c("The University of Chicago Pritzker School of Medicine"),
        c("2020-2022")
      ),
      # northshore
      cbind(
        c("ns-omni.png"), 
        c("Postdoctoral Research Fellowship"),
        c("Department of Ob/Gyn"),
        c("NorthShore Univeristy HealthSystem"),
        c("2020-2022")
        ),
      # luc teaching
      cbind(
        c("luc-omni.png"),
        c("Part-Time Faculty"),
        c("Department of Psychology"),
        c("Loyola University Chicago"),
        c("2020-2022")
      ),
      # UTD 
      cbind(
        c("utd-omni.png"),
        c("Graduate Research and Teaching Assistant"),
        c("School of Behavioral and Brain Sciences"),
        c("The University of Texas at Dallas"),
        c("2014-2019")
        ),
      # LUC
      cbind(
        c("luc-omni.png"),
        c("Laboratory Manager"),
        c("Department of Psychology"),
        c("Loyola Univeristy Chicago"),
        c("2013-2014")
        )
      )
    )

# prof position table
reactable(
  prof_pos,
  columns = 
    list(
      # LOGO
      logo = colDef(
        cell = function(value){
          image <- img(src = paste0("images/", value), style = "height: 75px;")
          tagList(div(style = "display: inline-block; width: 45px;", image))
          },
        name = "Institution", width = 150, align = "left"
      ),
      # POSITION
      pos = colDef(
        name = "Position/Department/Institution",
        cell = function(value, index){
          dep <- prof_pos$dep[index]
          inst <- prof_pos$inst[index]
          div(
            div(style = list(fontWeight = 600), value),
            div(style = list(fontSize = "0.75rem"), dep),
            div(style = list(fontSize = "0.75rem"), inst)
            )
        }
        ),
      # DATE
      date = colDef(name = "Dates", width = 150),
      # DEP
      dep = colDef(show = FALSE),
      # INST
      inst = colDef(show = FALSE)
    ),
  defaultColDef = colDef(vAlign = "center", headerVAlign = "bottom"),
  fullWidth = TRUE,
  theme = reactableTheme(backgroundColor = "transparent") # for dark mode
  )
```

        year = "2021-2023",
        role = "Fundraising Coordinator",
        conf = "Chicago Society for Neuroscience"
      ),
      cbind(
        year = "2019",
        role = "Organizer",
        conf = "BrainHack Dallas"
        )

    ) %>%
  select(role, conf, year)

# conf org table
reactable(
  conf_org,
  columns = list(
    role = colDef(name = "Role"),
    conf = colDef(name = "Conference"),

  ),
  defaultColDef = colDef(vAlign = "center", headerVAlign = "bottom"),

)
